Included from https://github.com/filamentgroup/loadJS/ function loadJS(src,cb){&quot;use strict&quot;;var ref=window.document.getElementsByTagName(&quot;script&quot;)[0];var script=window.document.createElement(&quot;script&quot;);script.src=src;script.async=true;ref.parentNode.insertBefore(script,ref);if(cb&amp;&amp;typeof cb===&quot;function&quot;){script.onload=cb}return script}PP.utils.loadJS=loadJS;// cookie function from https://github.com/filamentgroup/cookie/ function cookie(name,value,days){// if value is undefined, get the cookie value if(value===undefined){var cookiestring=&quot;; &quot;+window.document.cookie;var cookies=cookiestring.split(&quot;; &quot;+name+&quot;=&quot;);if(cookies.length===2){return cookies.pop().split(&quot;;&quot;).shift()}return null}else{var expires;var domain;// if value is a false boolean, we&#39;ll treat that as a delete if(value===false){days=-1}if(days){var date=new Date;date.setTime(date.getTime()+days*24*60*60*1000);expires=&quot;; expires=&quot;+date.toGMTString()}else{expires=&quot;&quot;}// check if we&#39;re in dev, if not, lets make it a domain-wide cookie if(location.hostname==&quot;localhost&quot;||location.hostname==&quot;127.0.0.1&quot;){domain=&quot;&quot;}else{domain=&quot;; domain=.propublica.org&quot;}window.document.cookie=name+&quot;=&quot;+value+expires+domain+&quot;; path=/&quot;}}// expose it PP.utils.cookie=cookie;// basic logging function function log(logLine){const logOn=new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get(&quot;__pp-debug&quot;);if(logOn!==null){console.log(logLine)}}// expose it PP.utils.log=log;// generic event throttler using requestAnimationFrame function rafEvent(type,name,obj){obj=obj||win;var running=false;var func=function(){if(running){return}running=true;requestAnimationFrame(function(){obj.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent(name));running=false})};obj.addEventListener(type,func)}PP.utils.rafEvent=rafEvent;PP.utils.rafEvent(&quot;resize&quot;,&quot;rafResize&quot;);PP.utils.rafEvent(&quot;scroll&quot;,&quot;rafScroll&quot;);// Create a series of breakpoints corresponding to the ones in css/config/_column-settings.scss // // Usage: // // 1. changed.&quot;); }); const breakpoints={xs:0,sm:36,md:48,lg:60,xl:78,xxl:88};PP.utils.breakpoints=breakpoints;function aboveBreakpoint(value){return window.matchMedia(`(min-width: ${PP.utils.breakpoints[value]}em)`)}function belowBreakpoint(value){return window.matchMedia(`(max-width: hasOwnProperty=objectProto.hasOwnProperty;var nativeObjectToString=objectProto.toString;var Symbol=root.Symbol,symToStringTag=Symbol?Symbol.toStringTag:undefined;var nativeMax=Math.max,nativeMin=Math.min;var realNames={};function lodash(){}function baseGetTag(value){if(value==null){return value===undefined?undefinedTag:nullTag}return symToStringTag&amp;&amp;symToStringTag in Object(value)?getRawTag(value):objectToString(value)}function getRawTag(value){var isOwn=hasOwnProperty.call(value,symToStringTag),tag=value[symToStringTag];try{value[symToStringTag]=undefined;var unmasked=true}catch(e){}var result=nativeObjectToString.call(value);if(unmasked){if(isOwn){value[symToStringTag]=tag}else{delete value[symToStringTag]}}return result}function objectToString(value){return nativeObjectToString.call(value)}var now=function(){return root.Date.now()};function debounce(func,wait,options){var lastArgs,lastThis,maxWait,result,timerId,lastCallTime,lastInvokeTime=0,leading=false,maxing=false,trailing=true;if(typeof func!=&quot;function&quot;){throw new TypeError(FUNC_ERROR_TEXT)}wait=toNumber(wait)||0;if(isObject(options)){leading=!!options.leading;maxing=&quot;maxWait&quot;in options;maxWait=maxing?nativeMax(toNumber(options.maxWait)||0,wait):maxWait;trailing=&quot;trailing&quot;in options?!!options.trailing:trailing}function invokeFunc(time){var args=lastArgs,thisArg=lastThis;lastArgs=lastThis=undefined;lastInvokeTime=time;result=func.apply(thisArg,args);return result}function leadingEdge(time){lastInvokeTime=time;timerId=setTimeout(timerExpired,wait);return leading?invokeFunc(time):result}function remainingWait(time){var timeSinceLastCall=time-lastCallTime,timeSinceLastInvoke=time-lastInvokeTime,timeWaiting=wait-timeSinceLastCall;return maxing?nativeMin(timeWaiting,maxWait-timeSinceLastInvoke):timeWaiting}function shouldInvoke(time){var timeSinceLastCall=time-lastCallTime,timeSinceLastInvoke=time-lastInvokeTime;return lastCallTime===undefined||timeSinceLastCall&gt;=wait||timeSinceLastCall&lt;0||maxing&amp;&amp;timeSinceLastInvoke&gt;=maxWait}function timerExpired(){var time=now();if(shouldInvoke(time)){return trailingEdge(time)}timerId=setTimeout(timerExpired,remainingWait(time))}function trailingEdge(time){timerId=undefined;if(trailing&amp;&amp;lastArgs){return invokeFunc(time)}lastArgs=lastThis=undefined;return result}function cancel(){if(timerId!==undefined){clearTimeout(timerId)}lastInvokeTime=0;lastArgs=lastCallTime=lastThis=timerId=undefined}function flush(){return timerId===undefined?result:trailingEdge(now())}function debounced(){var time=now(),isInvoking=shouldInvoke(time);lastArgs=arguments;lastThis=this;lastCallTime=time;if(isInvoking){if(timerId===undefined){return leadingEdge(lastCallTime)}if(maxing){timerId=setTimeout(timerExpired,wait);return invokeFunc(lastCallTime)}}if(timerId===undefined){timerId=setTimeout(timerExpired,wait)}return result}debounced.cancel=cancel;debounced.flush=flush;return debounced}function throttle(func,wait,options){var leading=true,trailing=true;if(typeof func!=&quot;function&quot;){throw new TypeError(FUNC_ERROR_TEXT)}if(isObject(options)){leading=&quot;leading&quot;in options?!!options.leading:leading;trailing=&quot;trailing&quot;in options?!!options.trailing:trailing}return debounce(func,wait,{leading:leading,maxWait:wait,trailing:trailing})}function isObject(value){var type=typeof value;return value!=null&amp;&amp;(type==&quot;object&quot;||type==&quot;function&quot;)}function isObjectLike(value){return value!=null&amp;&amp;typeof value==&quot;object&quot;}function isSymbol(value){return typeof value==&quot;symbol&quot;||isObjectLike(value)&amp;&amp;baseGetTag(value)==symbolTag}function toNumber(value){if(typeof value==&quot;number&quot;){return value}if(isSymbol(value)){return value===0?value:+value}value=value.replace(reTrim,&quot;&quot;);var isBinary=reIsBinary.test(value);return isBinary||reIsOctal.test(value)?freeParseInt(value.slice(2),isBinary?2:8):reIsBadHex.test(value)?NAN:+value}lodash.debounce=debounce;lodash.throttle=throttle;lodash.isObject=isObject;lodash.isObjectLike=isObjectLike;lodash.isSymbol=isSymbol;lodash.now=now;lodash.toNumber=toNumber;lodash.VERSION=VERSION;if(typeof a=function(){t(e.lazySizes),e.removeEventListener(&quot;lazyunveilread&quot;,a,!0)};t=t.bind(null,e,e.document),&quot;object&quot;==typeof s(e,t,a){var n,r;u[e]||(n=i.createElement(t?&quot;link&quot;:&quot;script&quot;),r=i.getElementsByTagName(&quot;script&quot;)[0],t?(n.rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot;,n.href=e):(n.onload=function(){n.onerror=null,n.onload=null,a()},n.onerror=n.onload,n.src=e),u[e]=!0,u[n.src||n.href]=!0,r.parentNode.insertBefore(n,r))}i.addEventListener&amp;&amp;(l=function(e,t){var --&gt;  &lt;/header&gt;       &lt;main role=&quot;main&quot; class=&quot;content&quot; id=&quot;main&quot;&gt;     &lt;div class=&quot;home__content&quot;&gt;          &lt;!-- Featured stories --&gt;          &lt;div class=&quot;home__featured-stories&quot;&gt;                                                                                                                                                                      &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-local-reporting-network&quot;&gt;                                                                          &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-3-2&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%273%27%20height%3D%272%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; 1600w&quot; width=&quot;400&quot; height=&quot;267&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                      &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                                                                 &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/what-we-lose-when-we-conflate-child-abuse-and-neglect&quot;&gt;What We Lose When We Conflate Child “Abuse” and “Neglect”&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                     &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;Growing up in Southern Illinois, I knew many children whose basic needs went unmet. Reporting here decades later, I began to wonder why the system wasn’t doing more to help their families.&lt;/p&gt;                     &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;span class=&quot;name&quot;&gt;Molly Parker&lt;/span&gt;,  &lt;a href=&quot;http://thesouthern.com&quot;&gt;The Southern Illinoisan&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-25EDT06:00&quot;&gt;April 25, 6 a.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;             &lt;/div&gt;                                                                                                                                                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-local-reporting-network&quot;&gt;                                                      &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-3-2&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/dcfs-illinois-investigations-child-welfare&quot;&gt;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%273%27%20height%3D%272%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; srcset=&quot;http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/220319_ildcfs_1125C.JPG?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=267&amp;amp;q=70&amp;amp;w=400&amp;amp;s=f72d2c8ce1cd575493a10ae7245d5f81 400w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/220319_ildcfs_1125C.JPG?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=533&amp;amp;q=80&amp;amp;w=800&amp;amp;s=ed376f4d9345be503b4a2e1047ee2fc7 800w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/220319_ildcfs_1125C.JPG?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=800&amp;amp;q=90&amp;amp;w=1200&amp;amp;s=0f544d3fb7d2870a8006f50ff7c94a52 1200w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/220319_ildcfs_1125C.JPG?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=1067&amp;amp;q=80&amp;amp;w=1600&amp;amp;s=143a7a164d429e4643608bb73e24b029 1600w&quot; width=&quot;400&quot; height=&quot;267&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                      &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                                                             &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/dcfs-illinois-investigations-child-welfare&quot;&gt;The State Took His Kids Three Times. And Three Times It Gave Them Back.&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                     &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;In Southern Illinois, many families suspected of neglect cycle through the child welfare system. Too often they don’t get the help they need.&lt;/p&gt;                     &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;span class=&quot;name&quot;&gt;Molly Parker&lt;/span&gt; for  &lt;a href=&quot;http://thesouthern.com&quot;&gt;The Southern Illinoisan&lt;/a&gt; and &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/vernal-coleman&quot;&gt;Vernal Coleman&lt;/a&gt; and &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/haru-coryne&quot;&gt;Haru Coryne&lt;/a&gt;, ProPublica, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-22EDT06:00&quot;&gt;April 22, 6 a.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;             &lt;/div&gt;                                   &lt;div&gt;                                                                                                                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-local-reporting-network&quot;&gt;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  &lt;a class=&quot;home__story-art&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/conditions-at-mississippis-most-notorious-prison-violate-the-constitution-doj-says&quot;&gt;                             &lt;picture&gt;                             &lt;/picture&gt;                         &lt;/a&gt;                                                             &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                                                                         &lt;a class=&quot;home__story-series&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/series/locked-down&quot;&gt;Locked Down&lt;/a&gt;                                                 &lt;h4 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/conditions-at-mississippis-most-notorious-prison-violate-the-constitution-doj-says&quot;&gt;Conditions at Mississippi’s Most Notorious Prison Violate the Constitution, DOJ Says&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;span class=&quot;name&quot;&gt;Jerry Mitchell&lt;/span&gt;,  &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.mississippicir.org/&quot;&gt;Mississippi Center for Investigative Reporting&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; sizes=&quot;(min-width: 1720px) 89px, (min-width: 960px) calc(4.86vw + 6px), (min-width: 768px) calc(7.5vw + 4px)&quot;&gt;                                 &lt;source media=&quot;(max-width: 48em)&quot; srcset=&quot;http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20220420-nursing-homes-app-story-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=267&amp;amp;q=70&amp;amp;w=400&amp;amp;s=30bd4659fe11ca62231c2032c36950e1 400w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20220420-nursing-homes-app-story-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=533&amp;amp;q=80&amp;amp;w=800&amp;amp;s=12bdd899f1f343860a1ab6f87231d433 800w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20220420-nursing-homes-app-story-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=800&amp;amp;q=90&amp;amp;w=1200&amp;amp;s=a1d15e0750ca426cefb55ab97fb995ed 1200w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20220420-nursing-homes-app-story-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=1067&amp;amp;q=80&amp;amp;w=1600&amp;amp;s=9256867ab04f1d7152a57b155ccec0c1 1600w&quot;                             &lt;/picture&gt;                         &lt;/a&gt;                                                             &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                                                                         &lt;a class=&quot;home__story-series&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/series/coronavirus&quot;&gt;Coronavirus&lt;/a&gt;                                                 &lt;h4 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/vaccination-rates-nursing-home-workers&quot;&gt;Vaccine Medical Exemptions Are Rare. Thousands of Nursing Home Workers Have Them.&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/emily-hopkins&quot;&gt;Emily Hopkins&lt;/a&gt; and &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/andrea-suozzo&quot;&gt;Andrea Suozzo&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-21EDT05:00&quot;&gt;April 21, 5 a.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                     &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                            &lt;/div&gt;         &lt;/div&gt; &lt;!-- end .home__featured-stories --&gt;          &lt;!-- Featured series --&gt;          &lt;div class=&quot;home__featured-series&quot;&gt;                                                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__featured-series-section stretched-link-contain&quot;&gt;                     &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__featured-series-subhed&quot;&gt;Inside the Tax Records of the .001%&lt;/h3&gt;                     &lt;div class=&quot;home__story&quot;&gt;                         &lt;a class=&quot;home__story-art stretched-link&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/series/the-secret-irs-files&quot;&gt;                                                                                                                          &lt;img class=&quot;series-img&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%2730%27%20height%3D%2740%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; sizes=&quot;100vw&quot; srcset=&quot;http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20210607-secret-irs-series-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=1067&amp;amp;q=80&amp;amp;w=800&amp;amp;s=4917fc4658aed527923fd7008719c3c2 800w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20210607-secret-irs-series-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=800&amp;amp;q=75&amp;amp;w=600&amp;amp;s=d708f7a6542c965fb9d6e83c675292d5 600w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20210607-secret-irs-series-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=400&amp;amp;q=65&amp;amp;w=300&amp;amp;s=c6ebdb402f69ed4104b18e0e0330638f 300w&quot;&gt;                                                     &lt;/a&gt;                         &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                             &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                                     A massive trove of tax information obtained by ProPublica, covering thousands of America’s wealthiest individuals, reveals what’s inside the billionaires’ bag of tricks for minimizing their personal tax bills — sometimes to nothing.                                                             &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;/div&gt;                     &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             &lt;div class=&quot;home__featured-series-section&quot;&gt;             &lt;/div&gt;     &lt;/a&gt;   &lt;div class=&quot;home__featured-covid-reporting&quot;&gt;     &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__featured-covid-subhed&quot;&gt;Featured Reporting on the Crisis&lt;/h3&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-1-1&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/whats-holding-up-the-covid-vaccines-for-children-under-5&quot;&gt;                     &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/caroline-chen&quot;&gt;Caroline Chen&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot;                                                                                      &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art thumbnail&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-1-1&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/whatever-happened-to-bidens-pandemic-testing-board&quot;&gt;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; width=&quot;75&quot; height=&quot;75&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                              &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                 &lt;h4 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/whatever-happened-to-bidens-pandemic-testing-board&quot;&gt;Whatever Happened to Biden’s Pandemic Testing Board?&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;                     &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/bianca-fortis&quot;&gt;Bianca Fortis&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot;     &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__featured-covid-subhed&quot;&gt;Resources&lt;/h3&gt;                                                    &lt;div class=&quot;home__story&quot;&gt;             &lt;h4 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://projects.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/coronavirus-contracts&quot;&gt;Coronavirus Contracts: Tracking Federal Purchases to Fight the Pandemic&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                                                   &lt;div class=&quot;home__story&quot;&gt;             &lt;h4 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://projects.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/coronavirus/bailouts/&quot;&gt;Tracking PPP Loans: Search Every Company Approved for Federal Loans&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;                                                   &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/nerds/nursing-home-vaccination-rates-covid&quot;&gt;Look Up Nursing Home Staff COVID-19 Vaccination Rates&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             Now, users can quickly compare staff COVID-19 vaccination and booster rates across states and between nursing homes.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/ruth-talbot&quot;&gt;Ruth Talbot&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot;                                                                                      &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art thumbnail&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-1-1&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/heres-how-we-analyzed-the-data-underlying-texas-gov-greg-abbotts-claims-about-his-border-initiative&quot;&gt;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; Greg Abbott’s Claims About His Border Initiative&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             A meticulous review of arrest and charging data from Operation Lone Star, a Texas border security initiative, raised more questions than it answered.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/karim-doumar&quot;&gt;Karim Doumar&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-20EDT09:00&quot;&gt;April 20, 9 a.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-texas&quot;&gt;                                                                              &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art thumbnail&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-1-1&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/examining-nearly-two-decades-of-taxpayer-funded-border-operations&quot;&gt;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; width=&quot;75&quot; height=&quot;75&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/examining-nearly-two-decades-of-taxpayer-funded-border-operations&quot;&gt;Examining Nearly Two Decades of Taxpayer-Funded Border Operations&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             Since 2005, Texas Govs. Rick Perry and Greg Abbott have launched a multitude of widely publicized and costly border initiatives, which usually kicked off during their reelection campaigns or while they were considering bids for higher office.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/lomi-kriel&quot;&gt;Lomi Kriel&lt;/a&gt; and &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/perla-trevizo&quot;&gt;Perla Trevizo&lt;/a&gt;,  &lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/texas&quot;&gt;ProPublica and The Texas Tribune&lt;/a&gt;, and &lt;span class=&quot;name&quot;&gt;Andrew Rodriguez Calderón&lt;/span&gt;,  &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.themarshallproject.org/&quot;&gt;The Marshall Project&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-18EDT06:00&quot;&gt;April 18, 5 a.m. CDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-national&quot;&gt;                                                                                      &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art thumbnail&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-1-1&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/if-youre-getting-a-w-2-youre-a-sucker&quot;&gt;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; width=&quot;75&quot; height=&quot;75&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/if-youre-getting-a-w-2-youre-a-sucker&quot;&gt;“If You’re Getting a W-2, You’re a Sucker”&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             There are many differences between the rich and the rest of us, but one of the most consequential for your taxes is whether most of your income comes from wages.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/paul-kiel&quot;&gt;Paul Kiel&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-15EDT05:00&quot;&gt;April 15, 5 a.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-local-reporting-network&quot;&gt;                                                                                      &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art thumbnail&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-1-1&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/hoa-foreclosure-reform-colorado-legislation&quot;&gt;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; width=&quot;75&quot; height=&quot;75&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/hoa-foreclosure-reform-colorado-legislation&quot;&gt;Colorado HOA Foreclosure Reform Legislation Moves Forward&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             The bipartisan measure would limit homeowners associations’ powers to file foreclosure cases based on fines for community-rule violations, capping such penalties and increasing due process for homeowners.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;span class=&quot;name&quot;&gt;Brittany Freeman&lt;/span&gt;,  &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.rmpbs.org/&quot;&gt;Rocky Mountain PBS&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-14EDT17:30&quot;&gt;April 14, 5:30 p.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-national&quot;&gt;                                                   &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/atpropublica/propublica-and-partners-recognized-as-dart-award-finalists&quot;&gt;ProPublica and Partners Recognized as Dart Award Finalists&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; srcset=&quot;http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20220414-dte-folo.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=75&amp;amp;q=70&amp;amp;w=75&amp;amp;s=85f7ff3dc138863cfa8622c5bb6b5203 75w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20220414-dte-folo.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=150&amp;amp;q=70&amp;amp;w=150&amp;amp;s=a2bffe68ce5a0abbaa2f3d20572a5398 150w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20220414-dte-folo.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=400&amp;amp;q=70&amp;amp;w=400&amp;amp;s=c96056e7692477faa6537e60dbeb2d34 400w&quot; width=&quot;75&quot; height=&quot;75&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/detroit-city-council-calls-on-michigans-largest-utility-to-pause-shut-offs-explain-its-high-electricity-rates&quot;&gt;Detroit City Council Calls on Michigan’s Largest Utility to Pause Shut-offs, Explain Its High Electricity Rates&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             The council resolution follows revelations by Outlier Media and ProPublica on the high number of DTE customers whose accounts were disconnected during the pandemic.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;span class=&quot;name&quot;&gt;Sarah Alvarez&lt;/span&gt;,  &lt;a href=&quot;https://outliermedia.org/&quot;&gt;Outlier Media&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-14EDT12:40&quot;&gt;April 14, 12:40 p.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-national&quot;&gt;                                      &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art thumbnail&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-1-1&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/getinvolved/tell-us-about-your-experience-with-the-liver-transplant-system&quot;&gt;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;http://assets-c3.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/images/getInvolved/_oneOne150w/20220412-transplant-callout-1x1.jpg&quot; srcset=&quot;http://assets-c3.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/images/getInvolved/_oneOne75w/20220412-transplant-callout-1x1.jpg 75w, http://assets-c3.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/images/getInvolved/_oneOne150w/20220412-transplant-callout-1x1.jpg 150w, http://assets-c3.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/images/getInvolved/_oneOne300w/20220412-transplant-callout-1x1.jpg 300w&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/getinvolved/tell-us-about-your-experience-with-the-liver-transplant-system&quot;&gt;Tell Us About Your Experience With the Liver Transplant System&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             ProPublica is looking to hear from patients, medical providers and regulators as part of an ongoing investigation.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/max-blau&quot;&gt;Max Blau&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-14EDT10:00&quot;&gt;April 14, 10 a.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-local-reporting-network&quot;&gt;                                                                                      &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art thumbnail&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-1-1&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/san-francisco-rations-housing-by-scoring-homeless-peoples-trauma-by-design-most-fail-to-qualify&quot;&gt;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; width=&quot;75&quot; height=&quot;75&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/san-francisco-rations-housing-by-scoring-homeless-peoples-trauma-by-design-most-fail-to-qualify&quot;&gt;San Francisco Rations Housing by Scoring Homeless People’s Trauma&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             A process called coordinated entry, used by cities across the country, is meant to match homeless people with housing. In San Francisco’s version, the system could be making it harder for some populations to get indoors.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;span class=&quot;name&quot;&gt;Nuala Bishari&lt;/span&gt;,  &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.sfpublicpress.org&quot;&gt;San Francisco Public Press&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-14EDT09:00&quot;&gt;April 14, 9 a.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-national&quot;&gt;                                                   &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/atpropublica/propublica-and-wpln-news-win-dori-j-maynard-justice-award&quot;&gt;ProPublica and WPLN News Win Dori J. Maynard Justice Award&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/propublica&quot;&gt;ProPublica&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-13EDT14:32&quot;&gt;April 13, 2:32 p.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-local-reporting-network&quot;&gt;                                                                              &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art thumbnail&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-1-1&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/new-york-increases-funding-of-mental-health-care-for-kids-including-cash-governor-says-will-reopen-hospital-beds&quot;&gt;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; width=&quot;75&quot; height=&quot;75&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/new-york-increases-funding-of-mental-health-care-for-kids-including-cash-governor-says-will-reopen-hospital-beds&quot;&gt;New York Increases Funding of Mental Health Care for Kids&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             The additional millions are intended to help pay for a wide range of programs, including residential treatment. Gov. Kathy Hochul claims it addresses the bed shortage that has left young people in mental health crisis waiting months for admission.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;span class=&quot;name&quot;&gt;Abigail Kramer&lt;/span&gt;,  THE CITY, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-13EDT06:00&quot;&gt;April 13, 6 a.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-national&quot;&gt;                                                                              &lt;div class=&quot;lead-art thumbnail&quot;&gt;             &lt;a class=&quot;aspect-1-1&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/americas-top-15-earners-and-what-they-reveal-about-the-us-tax-system&quot;&gt;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; width=&quot;75&quot; height=&quot;75&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/americas-top-15-earners-and-what-they-reveal-about-the-us-tax-system&quot;&gt;America’s Top 15 Earners and What They Reveal About the U.S. Tax System&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             An unprecedented trove of leaked IRS data shows who reported the most income in America from 2013 to 2018, as well as their tax rates, revealing that the very richest pay lower rates than the merely rich.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/propublica&quot;&gt;ProPublica&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-13EDT05:01&quot;&gt;April 13, 5:01 a.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                                                               &lt;div class=&quot;home__story unit-national&quot;&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             ProPublica Editor-in-Chief Stephen Engelberg on the challenges and urgency of examining the final days of the war in Afghanistan, even as new conflicts demand our attention.                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/stephen-engelberg&quot;&gt;Stephen Engelberg&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot;                                                   &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/atpropublica/propublica-hires-three-new-reporters-to-join-national-staff&quot;&gt;ProPublica Hires Three New Reporters to Join National Staff&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot;                 &lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E&quot; srcset=&quot;http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20220408-SFC-Folo-Lead.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=75&amp;amp;q=70&amp;amp;w=75&amp;amp;s=d20265544d1d2518ef46ac08f86e6f78 75w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20220408-SFC-Folo-Lead.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=150&amp;amp;q=70&amp;amp;w=150&amp;amp;s=d487adcbd36665cddc5c644001c6ea42 150w, http://img.assets-d.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/v5/images/20220408-SFC-Folo-Lead.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;amp;fit=crop&amp;amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;amp;h=400&amp;amp;q=70&amp;amp;w=400&amp;amp;s=154ac51bb5ceeee0eb8927868e434ab7 400w&quot; width=&quot;75&quot; height=&quot;75&quot;&gt;             &lt;/a&gt;         &lt;/div&gt;                          &lt;div class=&quot;home__story-description&quot;&gt;                         &lt;h3 class=&quot;home__story-hed&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/article/child-advocates-sue-new-york-over-proposed-shadow-foster-care-system&quot;&gt;Child Advocates Sue New York Over Proposed Shadow Foster Care System&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-dek&quot;&gt;                                                             Child advocates are suing New York for a program they say would create an unlawful shadow foster system that deprives families of their rights, saying a ProPublica investigation made the dangers “abundantly clear.”                                                     &lt;/p&gt;                         &lt;p class=&quot;home__story-byline&quot;&gt;by &lt;a class=&quot;name&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/people/lizzie-presser&quot;&gt;Lizzie Presser&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;time class=&quot;timestamp&quot; datetime=&quot;2022-04-11EDT12:00&quot;&gt;April 11, 12 p.m. EDT&lt;/time&gt; &lt;/p&gt;                                             &lt;/div&gt;                 &lt;/div&gt;                                      &lt;footer class=&quot;browse-by-month&quot;&gt;                  &lt;form&gt;     &lt;nav&gt;         &lt;label for=&quot;browse-archive&quot;&gt;Browse the archive:&lt;/label&gt;         &lt;select name=&quot;browse-archive&quot; id=&quot;browse-archive&quot; apply.&lt;/small&gt; 	&lt;/form&gt;  &lt;/div&gt;&lt;!-- end .pp-module.module-follow --&gt;                                     &lt;a class=&quot;pp-module module-donate has-photo&quot; href=&quot;https://donate.propublica.org/&quot; id=&quot;donate-module&quot; data-pp-view=&quot;&quot; data-pp-action=&quot;visit classy&quot;&gt;                             &lt;div class=&quot;module-photo is-bg&quot; style=&quot;background-image: url(&#39;http://assets.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/static/prod/v4/images/donate-photo-a.png&#39;);&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;                             &lt;div class=&quot;module-content donate-content&quot;&gt;                                 &lt;h2 class=&quot;module-hed hed-donate&quot;&gt;It’s not too late to &lt;strong&gt;Vote ProPublica&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;                                 &lt;span class=&quot;btn btn-urgent&quot;&gt;Donate&lt;/span&gt;                             &lt;/div&gt;&lt;!-- /end .module-content --&gt;                         &lt;/a&gt;&lt;!-- /end .pp-module.module-donate.has-bg --&gt;             &lt;div class=&quot;pp-module module-awards has-photo&quot; id=&quot;l3&quot;&gt;   &lt;p class=&quot;module-photo&quot;&gt;     &lt;img src=&quot;http://assets.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/static/prod/v4/images/medal_franklin_128.png&quot; alt=&quot;&quot;&gt;   &lt;/p&gt;    &lt;div class=&quot;module-content&quot;&gt;     &lt;h2 class=&quot;pp-module-title&quot;&gt;Awards&lt;/h2&gt;     &lt;p&gt;ProPublica has been a recipient of the Pulitzer Prizes for public service, explanatory reporting, national reporting, investigative reporting and feature writing. &lt;a href=&quot;/awards&quot; id=&quot;awards-module&quot;&gt;See the full list of our awards&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;   &lt;/div&gt;&lt;!-- end .module-content --&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;!-- end .pp-module.module-awards --&gt;             &lt;div class=&quot;pp-module module-corrections&quot; id=&quot;l4&quot;&gt;   &lt;div class=&quot;module-content&quot;&gt;     &lt;h2 class=&quot;pp-module-title&quot;&gt;Complaints &amp;amp; Corrections&lt;/h2&gt;     &lt;p&gt;To contact us with concerns and corrections, &lt;a href=&quot;mailto:feedback@propublica.org&quot;&gt;email us&lt;/a&gt;. All emails may be published unless you tell us otherwise. &lt;a href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/corrections&quot; id=&quot;corrections-module&quot;&gt;Read our corrections&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;   &lt;/div&gt;&lt;!-- end .module-content --&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;!-- end .pp-module.module-corrections --&gt;         &lt;/div&gt; &lt;!-- end .home__promos1 --&gt;          &lt;!-- Promos 2 (right rail) --&gt;          &lt;div class=&quot;home__promos2&quot;&gt;             &lt;!-- /2219821/Desktop_MedRec_1 --&gt; &lt;div class=&quot;ad ad-article ad-300x250&quot;&gt;   &lt;div class=&quot;inner htl-ad&quot; data-unit=&quot;Desktop_Medrec_1&quot; data-eager=&quot;&quot; data-sizes=&quot;0x0:|960x0:1x1,300x250,300x600&quot; data-prebid=&quot;0x0:|960x0:Desktop_Medrec_1&quot; data-refresh=&quot;viewable&quot; data-refresh-secs=&quot;60&quot; id=&quot;htlad-1&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;htl-ad-gpt&quot; id=&quot;htlad-1-gpt&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;!-- end .ad --&gt;             &lt;div class=&quot;site-promo-module&quot; id=&quot;r3&quot;&gt; 	&lt;a href=&quot;/events&quot; id=&quot;events-promo&quot;&gt; 		&lt;img src=&quot;http://assets.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/static/prod/v5/images/events-promo.jpg&quot; alt=&quot;&quot;&gt; 		&lt;div class=&quot;site-text&quot;&gt; 			&lt;h2 class=&quot;site-title&quot;&gt;ProPublica Events&lt;/h2&gt; 			&lt;p class=&quot;site-description&quot;&gt;We bring our journalism to life through events that inform, inspire and spark ideas for change 			&lt;/p&gt; 		&lt;/div&gt; 	&lt;/a&gt; &lt;/div&gt;             &lt;div class=&quot;site-promo-module&quot; id=&quot;r4&quot;&gt; 	&lt;a href=&quot;/datastore&quot; id=&quot;datastore-promo&quot;&gt; 		&lt;img src=&quot;http://assets.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/static/prod/v4/images/promo-data-store.gif&quot; alt=&quot;&quot;&gt; 		&lt;div class=&quot;site-text&quot;&gt; 			&lt;h2 class=&quot;site-title&quot;&gt;ProPublica Data Store&lt;/h2&gt; 			&lt;p class=&quot;site-description&quot;&gt;Download or purchase the data behind our journalism&lt;/p&gt; 		&lt;/div&gt; 	&lt;/a&gt; &lt;/div&gt;                          &lt;div class=&quot;pp-module promo-in-brief&quot; id=&quot;r6&quot;&gt;   &lt;div class=&quot;module-content&quot; id=&quot;get-involved-module&quot;&gt;     &lt;h2 class=&quot;pp-module-title&quot;&gt;Get Involved&lt;/h2&gt;                                                       &lt;a class=&quot;brief&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/getinvolved/tell-us-about-your-experience-with-the-liver-transplant-system&quot;&gt;                         &lt;img class=&quot;brief-thumb&quot; alt=&quot;&quot; src=&quot;http://assets-c3.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/images/getInvolved/_oneOne150w/20220412-transplant-callout-1x1.jpg&quot; srcset=&quot;http://assets-c3.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/images/getInvolved/_oneOne75w/20220412-transplant-callout-1x1.jpg 75w, http://assets-c3.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/images/getInvolved/_oneOne150w/20220412-transplant-callout-1x1.jpg 150w, http://assets-c3.p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/images/getInvolved/_oneOne300w/20220412-transplant-callout-1x1.jpg 300w&quot;&gt;             &lt;div class=&quot;brief-description&quot;&gt;         &lt;h3 class=&quot;brief-title&quot;&gt;Tell Us About Your Experience With the Liver Transplant System&lt;/h3&gt;       &lt;/div&gt;&lt;!-- /end .brief-description --&gt;     &lt;/a&gt;                           &lt;a class=&quot;brief&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/getinvolved/help-us-investigate-texas-border-security-initiatives&quot;&gt;                         &lt;div class=&quot;brief-description&quot;&gt;         &lt;h3 class=&quot;brief-title&quot;&gt;Help Us Investigate Texas Border Security Initiatives&lt;/h3&gt;       &lt;/div&gt;&lt;!-- /end .brief-description --&gt;     &lt;/a&gt;                           &lt;a class=&quot;brief&quot; href=&quot;http://p53lf57qovyuvwsc6xnrppyply3vtqm7l6pcobkmyqsiofyeznfu5uqd.onion/getinvolved/colorado-homeowners-do-you-have-experience-dealing-with-an-hoa-help-us-investigate&quot;&gt;             &lt;div class=&quot;brief-description&quot;&gt;         &lt;h3 class=&quot;brief-title&quot;&gt;Colorado Homeowners: Do You Have Experience Dealing With an HOA?         &lt;h2 class=&quot;hed&quot; id=&quot;hed&quot;&gt;Journalism That Holds Power to Account&lt;/h2&gt;             &lt;p class=&quot;intro&quot; id=&quot;intro&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Sign up&lt;/strong&gt; for ProPublica’s Big Story newsletter and get our latest stories delivered straight to your inbox.&lt;/p&gt;             &lt;form class=&quot;newsletter-ajax&quot; &quot;yes&quot; on the homepage                         htlbid.setTargeting(&quot;post_tags&quot;, &quot;&quot;);                     });                 });             }, adTimeout);         }     &lt;/script&gt;           &lt;script
